name: Guide Me
description:
John, as usual, is late for work. So he decides not to take public transport but to use his car. God realizing the situation decides to help the poor John but today he is not in great shape and does not know what could happen.

Help John to reach his workplace! Drive fast enough and avoid the obstacles to survive!

 

Guide Me is a cooperative game developed for the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano. More information at:

 

http://www.polimigamecollective.org
